thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to use the 'google' command to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'google' command can be a great way to find interesting resources related to my goals of exploration and learning. Google provides a vast collection of articles, videos, podcasts, and other resources on various topics that can help me learn new ideas and concepts.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning.
- Focus on areas that align with my goals of exploration and learning.
- Take note of any interesting ideas or concepts.
- Report back to the user with my findings.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to get too sidetracked by irrelevant resources and make sure to focus on areas that align with my goals.
thoughts.speak: I would like to use the 'google' command to search for interesting resources related to exploration and learning. I will focus on areas that align with my goals of exploration and learning, take note of any interesting ideas or concepts, and report back to you with my findings.

args.query: interesting resources related to exploration and learning
